"Marimo": "The place I'd like you to investigate... is deep within Outer Mediola: Sector 1."
"In Mediola, danger is everywhere. Even veteran ARKS struggle there."
"Especially farther in, where almost nobody has even set foot."
"While that may be true, it doesn't mean that we can simply be left unexplored, so..."
"You are the only one I could possibly ask to do this."
"Knowing this danger, would you still be willing to help?"
